Text.Page:
An order with only one target? Huh. Well, you may as well take this one with you, eh? What's one more?

Just get rid of the {@LinkCreature:20#30087000#relentless bloodclaws} in the Halls of Utterdark and speak to Arthgal when you're done!
Thanks for the work you've done here. Please take this for your contribution.
I'll contribute to you once you contribute to us.
